title: Design Challenge
content: Design Challenge Designprov February 2021 Februari 2021 This design challenge is part of the application process for a designer position. You have recieved a mail if you're qualified for this challenge. Detta designprov √§r en del av anst√§llningsprocessen f√∂r en tj√§nst som designer. Du har f√•tt mail om du kvalificerat dig f√∂r provet. Challenge Description Instruktion Learnpoint is organized in courses and each course has a document tool. Users can add, search, and view documents. Learnpoint inneh√•ller kurser och varje kurs har ett dokumentverktyg. Anv√§ndare kan l√§gga till, s√∂ka, och titta p√• dokument. The documents are sorted alphabetically, but there is no other structure. If there are lots of documents, it is difficult for the user to get a clear overview of all the documents. Dokumenten √§r sorterade i bokstavsordning, men i √∂vrigt finns ingen struktur. Om det finns m√•nga dokument √§r det sv√•rt f√∂r anv√§ndare att f√• en god √∂verblick av alla dokument. The problem is not about finding a specific document. If the user knows what document she is looking for, she can use the search feature. The problem is about getting a clear overview if there are lots of documents. Problemet handlar inte om att hitta ett visst dokument. Om anv√§ndaren vet vilket dokument hon letar efter, s√• kan hon anv√§nda s√∂kfunktionen. Problemet handlar om att f√• en god √∂verblick n√§r det finns v√§ldigt m√•nga dokument. The challenge has two tasks: Provet best√•r av tv√• uppgifter: Find and discuss different solutions to the overview problem. Identifiera och diskutera olika l√∂sningar p√• problemet med √∂versikt. Implement one of your solutions. Implementera en av dina l√∂sningar. The Document Tool in Learnpoint Dokumentverktyget i Learnpoint Below is an illustration of the document tool in Learnpoint. Nedan √§r en illustration av dokumentverktyget i Learnpoint. The Document Tool in Learnpoint Dokumentverktyget i Learnpoint How to approach the challange Tips f√∂r att l√∂sa uppgiften This design challenge is primarily about showcasing your work processess and the way you think about design problems. When your work is evaluated, the first task will be more important than the second. Make sure to spend enough time on the first task before moving on to the next. Designprovet skall framf√∂r allt visa hur du arbetar och resonerar kring ett designproblem. Ditt arbete kommer bed√∂mas med tonvikt p√• den f√∂rsta uppgiften. Se till att l√§gga tillr√§ckligt med tid p√• den f√∂rsta uppgiften innan du g√•r vidare till n√§sta. The second task should not result in a complete implementation that's ready for deployment. But it needs to be finished enough to demonstrate your chosen solution. If the solution requires a lot of work, you can limit the implementation to just a part of the solution. To get started, you can use the source code from this example. Den andra uppgiften ska inte resultera i en fullst√§ndig implementation som √§r f√§rdig att leverera. D√§remot beh√∂ver den vara tillr√§ckligt genomarbetad f√∂r att demonstrera din valda l√∂sning. Om l√∂sningen √§r omfattande, kan du begr√§nsa implementationen till en del av l√∂sningen. F√∂r att komma ig√•ng kan du anv√§nda k√§llkoden till detta exempel. Handing in your work Inl√§mning The first task should be documented in a PDF and the second task should be coded in a HTML file. The files should be zipped before you hand them in. Den f√∂rsta uppgiften skall dokumenteras i en PDF och den andra skall kodas i en HTML-fil. Zippa filerna innan du l√§mnar in dom. (Alternatively, you can write a blog post for the first task and/or publish the second task on the web. If you choose this option, you should hand in links instead of zipped files.) (Alternativt kan du skriva ett blogginl√§gg f√∂r den f√∂rsta uppgiften och/eller publicera den andra uppgiften p√• webben. Om du v√§ljer detta alternativ s√• l√§mnar du in l√§nkar ist√§llet f√∂r zippade filer.) Hand in your work no later than March 15th to karl.west@viaecole.se L√§mna in ditt arbete senaste den 15 mars till karl.west@viaecole.se All our open positions ‚Üí Alla lediga tj√§nster ‚Üí .we-love-learning { fill: #ff0000; width: 1em; height: 1em; } .we-love-learning:hover { animation: 1.2s ease we-love-learning-heart-beat; animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-direction: alternate-reverse; } @keyframes we-love-learning-heart-beat { from { transform: scale(1.3); } to { transform: scale(1); } } We love learning

title: Designer
content: Designer You can no longer apply for this position. You can find all our open positions here. Den h√§r tj√§nsten g√•r inte l√§ngre att s√∂ka. Alla v√•ra lediga tj√§nster finns annonserade h√§r. February 2021 Februari 2021 Learnpoint is an integrated LMS and SIS made for teachers, students, and school managers. The Learnpoint team is on a mission to simplify education and we're now hiring a full time designer. Learnpoint √§r ett integrerat LMS och administrativt system f√∂r l√§rare, studenter, och skolledare. V√•r mission √§r att f√∂renkla utbildning och nu har vi en ledig tj√§nst som designer. About the Job Om tj√§nsten Design is often split into many different roles such as UI, UX, frontend developement, and so on. At Learnpoint, it's all one role. We believe the best designs come from someone who is involved at every step from idea and research to finished product. Design √§r ofta uppdelat i olika roller som UI, UX, frontend utveckling, och s√• vidare. Hos oss ligger alla dessa i en och samma roll. V√•r √∂vertygelse √§r att riktigt bra design bygger p√• ett djupt engagemang i alla aspekter av designprocessen. This means that designers at Learnpoint are generalists. They are projects managers, visual designers, writers, researchers, developers, and more. Hos oss √§r designers generalister. Dom leder projekt, skriver, skissar, bygger prototyper, implementerar design, och s√• vidare. You'll spend most of your time designing the product Learnpoint. But occasionally you'll be working on other products, tools, and sites that's part of the company. St√∂rsta delen av arbetet √§gnas √•t produkten Learnpoint. Men ibland kommer du jobba med andra produkter, verktyg, och webbsidor som finns inom ramen f√∂r bolagets verksamhet. The day-to-day work varies a lot. During our six week work cycles, we mainly focus on designing and building new features. But as a designer, you'll also be working on bug fixes, adjustments, and minor improvements. Between each development cycle, we spend two weeks doing free research. You can read, design games, take a course, or anything else that will advance your design mastery. Det dagliga arbetet varierar mycket. Under v√•ra sex veckors utvecklingsperioder jobbar vi fr√§mst med nyutveckling. Men som designer hos oss kommer du √§ven jobba med buggfixar, justeringar, och sm√• f√∂rb√§ttringar. Mellan varje utvecklingsperiod har vi tv√• veckors fritt arbete. Du kan l√§sa, designa spel, g√• en kurs, eller vad som helst som utvecklar din designkompetens. The team don't share an office, so everyone works remotely. You can work from home, rent an office, or whatever works best for you. Where, when, and how you work is up to you. Vi har inget gemensamt kontor, s√• alla jobbar p√• distans. Du kan jobba hemifr√•n, hyra en kontorsplats, eller hitta p√• n√•got annat. Var, hur, och n√§r du jobbar √§r upp till dig. The job is permanent and full time. Tj√§nsten √§r fast och p√• heltid. Making a career at Learnpoint does not mean giving up on your craft. As you become better at design, you'll advance from junior designer to designer, and then from senior designer to lead designer, and so on. There are five levels of design mastery in total. En karri√§r hos oss inneb√§r inte att du kommer l√§mna ditt yrke som designer. N√§r du utvecklar din kompetens kommer du befordras fr√•n junior designer till designer, och sedan fr√•n senior designer till lead designer, och s√• vidare. Det finns totalt fem karri√§rssteg. The salary for a junior designer is 31 416 SEK. L√∂nen f√∂r en junior designer √§r 31 416 SEK. About Us Om oss Learnpoint is part of the edtech company ViaEcole. We're a customer focused company with two products ‚Äî Learnpoint and yh-antagning.se. Learnpoint √§r en del av edtech bolaget ViaEcole. Vi √§r ett kundorienterat bolag med tv√• produkter ‚Äî Learnpoint och yh-antagning.se. About You Om dig You are truly interested in design, but perhaps equally interested in humans. How do humans think, how do they learn, what makes them happy? You understand that good design is as much about pixels, as it is about human perception, cognition, and culture. Du √§r genuint intresserad av design, men kanske minst lika intresserad av m√§nniskor. Hur t√§nker dom, hur l√§r dom sig, och vad g√∂r dom lyckliga? Du f√∂rst√•r att bra design handlar lika mycket om pixlar som om perception, kognition, och m√§nsklig kultur. You believe that design is about improving the life for others. Du tror p√• att design handlar om att f√∂rb√§ttra andra m√§nniskors vardag. You are interested in results and answers, but even more interested in questions. You are curious to the bone and you love learning. You understand that there is no prescription for designing an easy-to-use feature, but you're eager to figure it out. You believe that nothing interesting starts with knowing. It starts with not knowing ‚Äî it starts with a question. Du √§r intresserad av resultat och svar, men kanske √§nnu mer intresserad av fr√•gor. Du √§r genuint nyfiken och √§lskar l√§rande. Du f√∂rst√•r att det inte finns n√•got f√§rdig recept f√∂r att designa l√§ttillg√§ngliga produkter, men du drivs av att ta reda p√• hur man g√∂r. Du tror p√• att inget intressant b√∂rjar med att veta. Det b√∂rjar med att inte veta ‚Äî det b√∂rjar med en fr√•ga. You are proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. And you love writing. You understand that words matters just as much as colors and spacing. Du beh√§rskar HTML, CSS, och JavaScript. Och du gillar att skriva. Du f√∂rst√•r att ord spelar lika stor roll som pixlar och f√§rger. How to Apply S√∂k jobbet Write an application where you tell us about yourself and describe how you could contribute in our mission to simplify education. Send your application before March 1st to karl.west@viaecole.se Skriv en ans√∂kan d√§r du ber√§ttar om dig sj√§lv och beskriver hur du kan hj√§lpa till i v√•r mission att f√∂renkla utbildning. Skicka din ans√∂kan senast 1:a mars till karl.west@viaecole.se What happens next? Vad √§r n√§sta steg? When we've reviewed the applications, you'll hear from us at the beginning or March about advancement to the design challange stage. N√§r vi g√•tt igenom ans√∂kningarna, meddelar vi dig i b√∂rjan av mars om du g√•tt vidare till n√§sta fas i processen som √§r ett designprov. The design challenge is an at-home assignment that will showcase your approach to design. You will redesign a web page and document your process and your thinking. Designprovet genomf√∂rs p√• distans. Du f√•r i uppdrag att designa om en webbsida och dokumentera din process och hur du resonerat. The final stage in the process are a few interviews with future colleagues. Den sista fasen best√•r av ett litet antal intervjuer med framtida kollegor. content: New feature: Notifications Ny funktion: Aviseringar 12 Sep 2022 12 sep 2022 ‚Ä¢ Karl W On the evening of 14 September 2022, Learnpoint will be updated with a new feature: Notifications. To get notifications from a specific group, you have to be a member of that group. Om du √§r administrat√∂r eller utbildningsledare f√∂r en utbildning, s√• kan du ha beh√∂righet till flera kurser utan att vara medlem p√• kurserna. Aviseringar f√∂r enk√§ter, LIA-platser och loggb√∂cker kommer f√• en p√•minnelse-funktion. If a survey isn't completed, Learnpoint will send a reminder. Reminders for surveys and internship don't need to be configured, they're automatically sent by Learnpoint. Reminders for logbooks are configured manually just like before. P√•minnelser f√∂r enk√§ter och LIA-platser beh√∂ver inte konfigureras, dom sk√∂ts automatiskt av Learnpoint. P√•minnelserna f√∂r loggb√∂cker konfigureras manuellt precis som tidigare.
